name: import-index-generator
description: Autogenerate a JS modules which exports all the modules present on a directory

scripts.test-same-output-dir: node main.js fixtures fixtures/result-js > /dev/null && diff fixtures/result-js fixtures/output-js
scripts.test-diff-output-dir: node main.js fixtures result-js-and-vue js,vue > /dev/null && diff  result-js-and-vue fixtures/output-js-and-vue
scripts.test-recurse-js: node main.js fixtures -r fixtures/result-recurse-js > /dev/null && diff fixtures/result-recurse-js fixtures/output-recurse-js
scripts.test-recurse-js-and-vue: node main.js -r fixtures fixtures/result-recurse-js-and-vue js,vue > /dev/null && diff fixtures/result-recurse-js-and-vue fixtures/output-recurse-js-and-vue
scripts.test: npm run -s test-same-output-dir && npm run -s test-diff-output-dir && npm run -s test-recurse-js && npm run -s test-recurse-js-and-vue && npm run -s clean

author: Cycloid (https://cycloid.io)
